title: Kate Green – 2020 Comments on Gavin Williamson and Taking Responsibility
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Education Secretary, on 2 September 2020.
content:
The evidence given by Ofqual today has raised serious questions about Gavin Williamson’s role in this summer’s exam fiasco.
